column1: Currency: Please only enter in values of USD, GBP and EUR. Platform values will be converted into USD. Only one currency is allowed per portfolio
As of Date: Please enter date in yyyy-mm-dd format
Identifier type: Please specify the values as one of the following Identifiers: ISIN, BBG_TICKER
Identifier: First column below !AsOfDate: Enter an ISIN or a full Bloomberg Ticker, example: T UN Equity or CMP UN Equity
Value: Second Column below !AsOfDate: Please enter total monetary value of investment; this must be in whole number format and in one single currency
